org.opensha.eq.model

Class FaultSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opensha.eq.model.FaultSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Rupture>, Source, Named
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InterfaceSource

    public class FaultSource
extends Object
implements Source
    Fault source representation. This class wraps a model of a fault geometry and a list of magnitude frequency distributions that characterize how the fault might rupture (e.g. as one, single geometry-filling event, or as multiple smaller events) during earthquakes. Smaller events are modeled as 'floating' ruptures; they occur in multiple locations on the fault surface with appropriately scaled rates.

    A FaultSource cannot be created directly; it may only be created by a private parser.

    Author:
    Peter Powers
